name: Merchant of Death
description:
Arrow keys or WASD to move, E to pick up a weapon and sell a weapon, Q to drop your whole inventory and get a speed boost, 1, 2, 3, 4 to use powerups in your inventory. 

Play as Grabs, a goblin merchant who dwells in a forest dungeon and makes a living by selling weapons to the enemies that live in the forest. Grabs is not a fighter, so he needs to avoid the "Heroes" that navigate the dungeon looking for easy xp. Find weapons off the ground from enemies that the heroes have killed, and sell the weapons to new customers before they meet their end. You can also lure the heroes to trick them into killing enemies for you. Find higher tier weapons to sell for more money, and use powerups to get out of rough spots. Try to get as much money as possible before you're caught by a hero!
